Principal InvestigatorDonald Bowden, PhDCenter for Human Genomics, Center for Diabetes Research, Wake Forest University School of Medicine, Winston-Salem, NC, USA
Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Type 2 Diabetes in African Americans, GWAS and Exome Sequencing
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Type 2 Diabetes in African Americans, GWAS and Exome Sequencing
Configuration.Description:
The T2D Seq GWAS AA Cohort is utilized in the following dbGaP sub-studies. To view genotypes, other molecular data, and derived variables collected in these sub-studies, please click on the following sub-studies below or in the "Sub-studies" box located on the right hand side of this top-level study page phs001167 T2D Seq GWAS AA Cohort.

  • phs000140 CIDR T2D Bowdens
  • phs001102 T2D GENES AA

Header.title: Principal Investigator
Header.Institution: Center for Human Genomics, Center for Diabetes Research, Wake Forest University School of Medicine, Winston-Salem, NC, USA

ConsentGroup.longName: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

DacInfo.DacFullName: NIDDK Central Repository GWAS Data Access Committee

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of the data must be related to Type 2 Diabetes and related disorders. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
